import React, { Component } from 'react' import '../../styles/browseMovie.css'; import movie from '../../assets/movie.jpg' import star from '../../assets/star-icon green.svg' import axios from 'axios'; class BrowseMovies extends Component { state = { allMovies: [] } componentDidMount() { axios.get('https://yts.mx/api/v2/list_movies.json?limit=50') .then(res => { this.setState({ allMovies: res.data.data.movies }) }) } render() { const allMovies = this.state; console.log(allMovies[0].title); const moviesList = allMovies.length ? ( allMovies.map(movie => { return (

{movie.rating} / 10
{movie.title}
{movie.year}
) }) ) : null return (

Search Movies:

{moviesList}

) } } export default BrowseMovies
